imdb.plot outline: Total Body Challenge Pilates is designed to make you leaner and stronger; adding the resistance band to your Pilates practice helps you isolate specific muscle groups to tone more efficiently. Linda Farrell's easy-to-follow instructions and demonstrations will make this one of your favorite Pilates workouts.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Total Body Challenge - Pilates
plot: Total Body Challenge Pilates is designed to make you leaner and stronger; adding the resistance band to your Pilates practice helps you isolate specific muscle groups to tone more efficiently.

Total Body Challenge Pilates is designed to make you leaner and stronger; adding the resistance band to your Pilates practice helps you isolate specific muscle groups to tone more efficiently.
